title: Stakeholder Analysis in Organizational Learning: A Critical Theory-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Organizational learning theories and fundamental knowledge in language education
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical application capabilities by analyzing stakeholder conflicts in organizational learning within language domains for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish technical interests (profit/power-centered) from lifeworld interests (practice/liberation-centered) in organizational learning processes.
Learners can analyze organizational learning cases in language education institutions by applying a critical theory framework.
Learners can propose three or more practical strategies to transform interest conflicts into opportunities for organizational learning.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
